Text:
Thanks very much... especially for the high-quality!
Looking forward to hearing (and buying) this VERY much!
Thanks very much, but... why 48kHz?, is this not from CD?
@Szymszel It is a original download from DCD web store.

Hello !
Be warned that this album is'nt verified as lossless by AudioChecker (not even one track).
It may be that DCD on their website are using upmixed flac files from a 192Khz master.
I found another release with 7 tracks verified as lossless, that certainly has been ripped from CD.
Nevertheless, many thanks for this share.

This is the official CD rip:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7612285/Anastasis_by_Dead_Can_Dance_(FLAC)

You can also find it in other formats such as Apple Lossless, MP3 and WAVE.
